com.thalesgroup.gemalto.fido2.authenticator.passcode

Class PasscodeAuthenticator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thalesgroup.gemalto.fido2.authenticator.passcode.PasscodeAuthenticator

  • public abstract class PasscodeAuthenticator
extends Object
    Manages the authenticator information regarding the Passcode Authenticator.

    A passcode enrollment process captures the user's passcode and generates a unique identifier. This passcode is then used to verify a user.

    Note: A user MUST be enrolled before the Passcode authenticator can be used for FIDO2 operations.

    Since:
    1.0.0

        callback - the callback that receives event regarding the enrollment and unenrollment process.
        Returns:
        a default instance of this class
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • enroll

        public abstract void enroll()
        Enroll the Passcode Authenticator.

        Users MUST be enrolled to the Passcode Authenticator to perform FIDO2 operations with the Passcode Authenticator. The enrollment process stores a secure means of identification which will be used to verify the user when authentication is required.

        Since:
        1.0.0

      • unenroll

        public abstract void unenroll()
        Unenroll the previously enrolled Passcode Authenticator.

        User authentication is required prior to a successful unenrollment.

        Upon successful unenrollment, all Fido2 registrations for the Passcode Authenticator will be invalidated. A subsequent enrollment is required to once again perform FIDO2 operations.

        Since:
        1.0.0

      • isEnrolled

        public abstract boolean isEnrolled()
        Indicates if the Passcode Authenticator is enrolled. Use this to determine if the user needs to be enrolled.
        Returns:
        true if enrolled
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • changePasscode

        public abstract void changePasscode()
        Change the existing passcode for the current Passcode Authenticator enrollment. This authenticator will invoke the PasscodeAuthenticatorCallback.onStart to provide a secure keyboard which should be displayed on the UI layer to authenticate the user prior to changing the passcode.

        Upon authentication, the user would be requested to input and confirm a new passcode which SHALL then be used to for authentication henceforth.

        Since:
        1.0.0
